00115 void DisplayFrameRate( )
00116 {
00117       static UINT32           uiFPS = 0;
00118       static UINT32           uiFrameCount = 0; 
00119       UINT16 usMapPos;
00120       VIDEO_OVERLAY_DESC            VideoOverlayDesc;
00121 
00122       // Increment frame count
00123       uiFrameCount++;
00124 
00125       if ( COUNTERDONE( FPSCOUNTER ) )
00126       {
00127             // Reset counter
00128             RESETCOUNTER( FPSCOUNTER );
00129 
00130             uiFPS = uiFrameCount;         
00131             uiFrameCount = 0;
00132       }
00133 
00134       // Create string
00135       SetFont( SMALLFONT1 );
00136 
00137       //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_0, String( "FPS: %d ", __min( uiFPS, 1000 ) ) );
00138       
00139       if ( uiFPS < 20 )
00140       {
00141             SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
00142             SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_LTRED );         
00143       }
00144       else
00145       {
00146             SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
00147             SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_DKGRAY );                    
00148       }
00149 
00150       if ( gbFPSDisplay == SHOW_FULL_FPS )
00151       {
00152             // FRAME RATE
00153             memset( &VideoOverlayDesc, 0, sizeof( VideoOverlayDesc ) );
00154             swprintf( (wchar_t *)VideoOverlayDesc.pzText, (wchar_t *)L"%ld", __min( uiFPS, 1000 ) );
00155             VideoOverlayDesc.uiFlags    = VOVERLAY_DESC_TEXT;
00156             UpdateVideoOverlay( &VideoOverlayDesc, giFPSOverlay, FALSE );
00157 
00158             // TIMER COUNTER        
00159             swprintf( (wchar_t *)VideoOverlayDesc.pzText, (wchar_t *)L"%ld", __min( giTimerDiag, 1000 ) );
00160             VideoOverlayDesc.uiFlags    = VOVERLAY_DESC_TEXT;
00161             UpdateVideoOverlay( &VideoOverlayDesc, giCounterPeriodOverlay, FALSE );
00162             
00163 
00164             if( GetMouseMapPos( &usMapPos) )
00165             {
00166                   //gprintfdirty( 0, 315, L"(%d)",usMapPos);            
00167                   //mprintf( 0,315,L"(%d)",usMapPos);       
00168             }
00169             else
00170             {
00171                   //gprintfdirty( 0, 315, L"(%d %d)",gusMouseXPos, gusMouseYPos - INTERFACE_START_Y );            
00172                   //mprintf( 0,315,L"(%d %d)",gusMouseXPos, gusMouseYPos - INTERFACE_START_Y );       
00173             }
00174       }
00175 
00176       if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & GODMODE ) )
00177       {
00178             SetFont( SMALLFONT1 );
00179             SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
00180             SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_DKRED );                     
00181             //gprintfdirty( 0, 0, L"GOD MODE" );
00182             //mprintf( 0, 0, L"GOD MODE" );
00183       }
00184 
00185       if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & DEMOMODE ) )
00186       {
00187             SetFont( SMALLFONT1 );
00188             SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
00189             SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_DKGRAY );                    
00190             //gprintfdirty( 0, 0, L"DEMO MODE" );
00191             //mprintf( 0, 0, L"DEMO MODE" );
00192       }
00193 
00194 #ifdef _DEBUG
00195 
00196       SetFont( SMALLFONT1 );
00197       SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
00198       SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_DKGRAY );                    
00199 
00200       if ( gbFPSDisplay == SHOW_FULL_FPS )
00201       {
00202             // Debug    
00203             if (gDebugStr[0] != '\0')
00204             {
00205                   //gprintfdirty( 0, 345, L"DEBUG: %S",gDebugStr);
00206                   //mprintf( 0,345,L"DEBUG: %S",gDebugStr);
00207             }
00208 
00209             if (gSystemDebugStr[0] != '\0')
00210             {
00211                   //gprintfdirty( 0, 345, L"%S",gSystemDebugStr);
00212                   //mprintf( 0,345,L"%S",gSystemDebugStr);
00213                   gSystemDebugStr[0] = '\0';
00214             }
00215 
00216             // Print Num tiles
00217             //gprintfdirty( 0, 280, L"%d Tiles", gTileDatabaseSize );
00218             //mprintf( 0, 280, L"%d Tiles", gTileDatabaseSize );
00219 
00220             // Print tile mem usage
00221             //gprintfdirty( 0, 300, L"%d kB", guiMemTotal / 1024 );
00222             //mprintf( 0, 300, L"%d kB", guiMemTotal / 1024 );
00223 
00224       }
00225 #endif
00226 
00227 }

00264 UINT32 ErrorScreenHandle(void)
00265 {
00266   InputAtom  InputEvent;
00267       static BOOLEAN    fFirstTime = FALSE;
00268 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00269       UINT16 str[256];
00270 #endif
00271 
00272       // For quick setting of new video stuff / to be changed
00273       StartFrameBufferRender( );
00274 
00275       // Create string
00276       SetFont( LARGEFONT1 );
00277       SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
00278       SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_LTGRAY );
00279       mprintf( 50, 200, L"RUNTIME ERROR" );
00280 
00281       mprintf( 50, 225, L"PRESS <ESC> TO EXIT" );
00282 
00283       SetFont( FONT12ARIAL );
00284       SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW ); 
00285       SetFontShadow( 60 );           //60 is near black
00286       mprintf( 50, 255, L"%S", gubErrorText );
00287       SetFontForeground( FONT_LTRED ); 
00288 
00289 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00290   
00291         if( gubAssertString[0] )
00292         {
00293               swprintf( str, L"%S", gubAssertString );
00294               DisplayWrappedString( 50, 270, 560, 2, FONT12ARIAL, FONT_RED, str, FONT_BLACK, TRUE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00295         }
00296 #endif
00297 
00298       if ( !fFirstTime )
00299       {
00300             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_0, String( "Runtime Error: %s ", gubErrorText ) );
00301             fFirstTime = TRUE;
00302       }
00303 
00304       // For quick setting of new video stuff / to be changed
00305       InvalidateScreen( );
00306       EndFrameBufferRender( );
00307 
00308       // Check for esc 
00309   while (DequeueEvent(&InputEvent) == TRUE)
00310   {
00311       if( InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN )
00312                   {
00313                         if( InputEvent.usParam == ESC || InputEvent.usParam == 'x' && InputEvent.usKeyState & ALT_DOWN )
00314                         { // Exit the program
00315                               DebugMsg(TOPIC_GAME, DBG_LEVEL_0, "GameLoop: User pressed ESCape, TERMINATING");
00316                               
00317                               // handle shortcut exit
00318                               HandleShortCutExitState( );                     
00319                         }
00320                   }
00321       }
00322 
00323       return( ERROR_SCREEN );
00324 }

00338 UINT32 InitScreenHandle(void)
00339 {
00340       VSURFACE_DESC                             vs_desc;
00341       static HVSURFACE              hVSurface;
00342       static UINT8                              ubCurrentScreen = 255;
00343 
00344       if ( ubCurrentScreen == 255 )
00345       {
00346       #ifdef ENGLISH
00347             if( gfDoneWithSplashScreen )
00348             {
00349                   ubCurrentScreen = 0;
00350             }
00351             else
00352             {
00353                   SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( VIDEO_NO_CURSOR );
00354                   return( INTRO_SCREEN );
00355             }
00356       #else
00357             ubCurrentScreen = 0;
00358       #endif
00359       }
00360 
00361       if ( ubCurrentScreen == 0 )
00362       {
00363             if ( strcmp( gzCommandLine, "-NODD" ) == 0 )
00364             {
00365                   gfDontUseDDBlits = TRUE;
00366             }
00367 
00368             // Load version number....
00369             //HandleLimitedNumExecutions( );
00370 
00371             // Load init screen and blit!
00372             vs_desc.fCreateFlags = VSURFACE_CREATE_FROMFILE | VSURFACE_SYSTEM_MEM_USAGE;
00373 
00374             strcpy( vs_desc.ImageFile, "ja2_logo.STI" );
00375 
00376             hVSurface = CreateVideoSurface( &vs_desc );
00377             if( !hVSurface )
00378                   AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to load ja2_logo.sti!" );
00379 
00380             //BltVideoSurfaceToVideoSurface( ghFrameBuffer, hVSurface, 0, 0, 0, VS_BLT_FAST, NULL );
00381             ubCurrentScreen = 1;
00382 
00383             // Init screen
00384 
00385             // Set Font
00386             SetFont( TINYFONT1 );
00387             SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
00388             SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE );
00389 
00390             //mprintf( 10, 420, zVersionLabel );
00391 
00392 #ifdef _DEBUG
00393             mprintf( 10, 10, L"%s: %s Debug %S", pMessageStrings[ MSG_VERSION ], zVersionLabel, czVersionNumber );
00394 #else
00395             mprintf( 10, 10, L"%s: %s %S", pMessageStrings[ MSG_VERSION ], zVersionLabel, czVersionNumber );
00396 #endif
00397 
00398 #ifdef CRIPPLED_VERSION
00399 
00400             mprintf( 10, 0, L"(LIMITED PRESS PREVIEW VERSION)" );
00401 
00402 #elif defined JA2BETAVERSION 
00403 
00404             mprintf( 10, 0, L"(Beta version error reporting enabled)" );
00405 
00406 #endif
00407 
00408 #ifdef _DEBUG 
00409             mprintf( 10, 20, L"SOLDIERTYPE: %d bytes", sizeof( SOLDIERTYPE ) );
00410 #endif
00411 
00412             if ( gfDontUseDDBlits )
00413             {
00414                   #ifdef _DEBUG 
00415                         mprintf( 10, 10, L"SOLDIERTYPE: %d bytes", sizeof( SOLDIERTYPE ) );
00416                   #else
00417                         mprintf( 10, 20, L"Using software blitters" );
00418                   #endif
00419             }
00420 
00421             InvalidateScreen( );
00422 
00423             // Delete video Surface
00424             DeleteVideoSurface( hVSurface );
00425             //ATE: Set to true to reset before going into main screen!
00426 
00427             SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( VIDEO_NO_CURSOR );
00428 
00429             return( INIT_SCREEN );
00430       }
00431 
00432       if ( ubCurrentScreen == 1 )
00433       {
00434             ubCurrentScreen = 2;
00435             return( InitializeJA2( ) );
00436       }
00437 
00438       if ( ubCurrentScreen == 2 )
00439       {
00440             InitMainMenu( );
00441             ubCurrentScreen = 3;
00442             return( INIT_SCREEN );
00443       }
00444 
00445       // Let one frame pass....
00446       if ( ubCurrentScreen == 3 )
00447       {
00448             ubCurrentScreen = 4;
00449             SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( VIDEO_NO_CURSOR );
00450             return( INIT_SCREEN );
00451       }
00452 
00453       if ( ubCurrentScreen == 4 )
00454       {
00455             SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( VIDEO_NO_CURSOR );
00456             InitNewGame( FALSE );
00457       }
00458       return( INIT_SCREEN );
00459 }

00475 UINT32 PalEditScreenHandle(void)
00476 {
00477       static BOOLEAN FirstTime = TRUE;
00478 
00479       if ( gfExitPalEditScreen )
00480       {
00481             gfExitPalEditScreen = FALSE;
00482             FirstTime = TRUE;
00483             FreeBackgroundRect( guiBackgroundRect );
00484             SetRenderHook( (RENDER_HOOK)NULL );
00485             SetUIKeyboardHook( (UIKEYBOARD_HOOK)NULL );
00486             return( GAME_SCREEN );
00487       }
00488       
00489       if ( FirstTime )
00490       {
00491             FirstTime = FALSE;
00492 
00493             SetRenderHook( (RENDER_HOOK)PalEditRenderHook );
00494             SetUIKeyboardHook( (UIKEYBOARD_HOOK)PalEditKeyboardHook );
00495 
00496             guiBackgroundRect = RegisterBackgroundRect( BGND_FLAG_PERMANENT, NULL, 50, 10, 600 , 400);
00497 
00498       }
00499       else
00500       {
00501 
00502             (*(GameScreens[GAME_SCREEN].HandleScreen))();
00503 
00504       }
00505 
00506       return( PALEDIT_SCREEN );
00507 
00508 }

00517 void PalEditRenderHook(  )
00518 {
00519       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;
00520 
00521       if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NO_SOLDIER )
00522       {
00523             // Set to current
00524             GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier );
00525 
00526             DisplayPaletteRep( pSoldier->HeadPal, 50, 10, FRAME_BUFFER );
00527             DisplayPaletteRep( pSoldier->PantsPal, 50, 50, FRAME_BUFFER );
00528             DisplayPaletteRep( pSoldier->VestPal, 50, 90, FRAME_BUFFER );
00529             DisplayPaletteRep( pSoldier->SkinPal, 50, 130, FRAME_BUFFER );
00530 
00531       }
00532 }
00533 
00534 BOOLEAN PalEditKeyboardHook( InputAtom *pInputEvent )
00535 {
00536       UINT8                         ubType;
00537       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;
00538       UINT8                         ubPaletteRep;
00539       UINT32                        cnt;
00540       UINT8                         ubStartRep = 0;
00541       UINT8                         ubEndRep = 0;
00542 
00543       if ( gusSelectedSoldier == NO_SOLDIER )
00544       {
00545             return( FALSE );
00546       }
00547 
00548   if ((pInputEvent->usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( pInputEvent->usParam == ESC ))
00549   { 
00550             gfExitPalEditScreen = TRUE;
00551             return( TRUE );
00552       }
00553 
00554   if ((pInputEvent->usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( pInputEvent->usParam == 'h' ))
00555   { 
00556                   // Get Soldier
00557                   GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier );
00558 
00559                   // Get index of current
00560                   CHECKF( GetPaletteRepIndexFromID( pSoldier->HeadPal, &ubPaletteRep ) );
00561                   ubType = gpPalRep[ ubPaletteRep ].ubType;
00562 
00563                   ubPaletteRep++;
00564 
00565                   // Count start and end index
00566                   for ( cnt = 0; cnt < ubType; cnt++ )
00567                   {
00568                         ubStartRep = (UINT8)(ubStartRep + gubpNumReplacementsPerRange[ cnt ]);
00569                   }
00570 
00571                   ubEndRep = (UINT8)(ubStartRep + gubpNumReplacementsPerRange[ ubType ]);
00572 
00573                   if ( ubPaletteRep == ubEndRep )
00574                   {
00575                         ubPaletteRep = ubStartRep;
00576                   }
00577                   SET_PALETTEREP_ID ( pSoldier->HeadPal,    gpPalRep[ ubPaletteRep ].ID );
00578 
00579                   CreateSoldierPalettes( pSoldier );
00580 
00581                   return( TRUE );
00582   }
00583 
00584 
00585   if ((pInputEvent->usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( pInputEvent->usParam == 'v' ))
00586   { 
00587                   // Get Soldier
00588                   GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier );
00589 
00590                   // Get index of current
00591                   CHECKF( GetPaletteRepIndexFromID( pSoldier->VestPal, &ubPaletteRep ) );
00592                   ubType = gpPalRep[ ubPaletteRep ].ubType;
00593 
00594                   ubPaletteRep++;
00595 
00596                   // Count start and end index
00597                   for ( cnt = 0; cnt < ubType; cnt++ )
00598                   {
00599                         ubStartRep = (UINT8)(ubStartRep + gubpNumReplacementsPerRange[ cnt ]);
00600                   }
00601 
00602                   ubEndRep = (UINT8)(ubStartRep + gubpNumReplacementsPerRange[ ubType ]);
00603 
00604                   if ( ubPaletteRep == ubEndRep )
00605                   {
00606                         ubPaletteRep = ubStartRep;
00607                   }
00608                   SET_PALETTEREP_ID ( pSoldier->VestPal,    gpPalRep[ ubPaletteRep ].ID );
00609 
00610                   CreateSoldierPalettes( pSoldier );
00611 
00612                   return( TRUE );
00613   }
00614 
00615   if ((pInputEvent->usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( pInputEvent->usParam == 'p' ))
00616   { 
00617                   // Get Soldier
00618                   GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier );
00619 
00620                   // Get index of current
00621                   CHECKF( GetPaletteRepIndexFromID( pSoldier->PantsPal, &ubPaletteRep ) );
00622                   ubType = gpPalRep[ ubPaletteRep ].ubType;
00623 
00624                   ubPaletteRep++;
00625 
00626                   // Count start and end index
00627                   for ( cnt = 0; cnt < ubType; cnt++ )
00628                   {
00629                         ubStartRep = (UINT8)(ubStartRep + gubpNumReplacementsPerRange[ cnt ]);
00630                   }
00631 
00632                   ubEndRep = (UINT8)(ubStartRep + gubpNumReplacementsPerRange[ ubType ]);
00633 
00634                   if ( ubPaletteRep == ubEndRep )
00635                   {
00636                         ubPaletteRep = ubStartRep;
00637                   }
00638                   SET_PALETTEREP_ID ( pSoldier->PantsPal,   gpPalRep[ ubPaletteRep ].ID );
00639 
00640                   CreateSoldierPalettes( pSoldier );
00641 
00642                   return( TRUE );
00643   }
00644 
00645   if ((pInputEvent->usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( pInputEvent->usParam == 's' ))
00646   { 
00647                   // Get Soldier
00648                   GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier );
00649 
00650                   // Get index of current
00651                   CHECKF( GetPaletteRepIndexFromID( pSoldier->SkinPal, &ubPaletteRep ) );
00652                   ubType = gpPalRep[ ubPaletteRep ].ubType;
00653 
00654                   ubPaletteRep++;
00655 
00656                   // Count start and end index
00657                   for ( cnt = 0; cnt < ubType; cnt++ )
00658                   {
00659                         ubStartRep = (UINT8)(ubStartRep + gubpNumReplacementsPerRange[ cnt ]);
00660                   }
00661 
00662                   ubEndRep = (UINT8)(ubStartRep + gubpNumReplacementsPerRange[ ubType ]);
00663 
00664                   if ( ubPaletteRep == ubEndRep )
00665                   {
00666                         ubPaletteRep = ubStartRep;
00667                   }
00668                   SET_PALETTEREP_ID ( pSoldier->SkinPal,    gpPalRep[ ubPaletteRep ].ID );
00669 
00670                   CreateSoldierPalettes( pSoldier );
00671 
00672                   return( TRUE );
00673   }
00674 
00675       return( FALSE );
00676 }

00683 
00684 BOOLEAN CheckForAndExitTacticalDebug( )
00685 {
00686       if ( gfExitDebugScreen )
00687       {
00688             FirstTime = TRUE;
00689             gfInitRect = TRUE;
00690             gfExitDebugScreen = FALSE;
00691             FreeBackgroundRect( guiBackgroundRect );
00692             SetRenderHook( (RENDER_HOOK)NULL );
00693             SetUIKeyboardHook( (UIKEYBOARD_HOOK)NULL );
00694 
00695             return( TRUE );
00696       }
00697 
00698       return( FALSE );
00699 }
00700 
00701 void ExitDebugScreen( )
00702 {
00703       if ( guiCurrentScreen == DEBUG_SCREEN )
00704       {
00705             gfExitDebugScreen = TRUE;
00706       }
00707 
00708       CheckForAndExitTacticalDebug( );
00709 }
00710 
00711 
00712 UINT32 DebugScreenHandle(void)
00713 {
00714       if ( CheckForAndExitTacticalDebug() )
00715       {
00716             return( GAME_SCREEN );
00717       }
00718       
00719       if ( gfInitRect )
00720       {
00721             guiBackgroundRect = RegisterBackgroundRect( BGND_FLAG_PERMANENT, NULL, 0, 0, 600 , 360);
00722             gfInitRect = FALSE;
00723       }
00724 
00725 
00726       if ( FirstTime )
00727       {
00728             FirstTime = FALSE;
00729 
00730             SetRenderHook( (RENDER_HOOK)DebugRenderHook );
00731             SetUIKeyboardHook( (UIKEYBOARD_HOOK)DebugKeyboardHook );
00732 
00733       }
00734       else
00735       {
00736 
00737             (*(GameScreens[GAME_SCREEN].HandleScreen))();
00738 
00739       }
00740 
00741       return( DEBUG_SCREEN );
00742 
00743 }
00744 
00745 UINT32 DebugScreenShutdown(void)
00746 {
00747 
00748       return( TRUE );
00749 }
00750 
00751 
00752 void DebugRenderHook(  )
00753 {
00754       gDebugRenderOverride[ gCurDebugPage ]( );
00755 }
00756 
00757 BOOLEAN DebugKeyboardHook( InputAtom *pInputEvent )
00758 {
00759   if ((pInputEvent->usEvent == KEY_UP )&& ( pInputEvent->usParam == 'q' ))
00760   { 
00761             gfExitDebugScreen = TRUE;
00762             return( TRUE );
00763       }
00764 
00765   if ((pInputEvent->usEvent == KEY_UP )&& ( pInputEvent->usParam == PGUP ))
00766   { 
00767             // Page down
00768             gCurDebugPage++;
00769 
00770             if ( gCurDebugPage == MAX_DEBUG_PAGES )
00771             {
00772                   gCurDebugPage = 0;
00773             }
00774 
00775             FreeBackgroundRect( guiBackgroundRect );
00776             gfInitRect = TRUE;
00777 
00778   }
00779 
00780   if ((pInputEvent->usEvent == KEY_UP )&& ( pInputEvent->usParam == PGDN ))
00781   { 
00782             // Page down
00783             gCurDebugPage--;
00784 
00785             if ( gCurDebugPage < 0 )
00786             {
00787                   gCurDebugPage = MAX_DEBUG_PAGES-1;
00788             }
00789 
00790             FreeBackgroundRect( guiBackgroundRect );
00791             gfInitRect = TRUE;
00792 
00793   }
00794 
00795       return( FALSE );
00796 }
00797 
00798 
00799 void SetDebugRenderHook( RENDER_HOOK pDebugRenderOverride, INT8 ubPage )
00800 {
00801       gDebugRenderOverride[ ubPage ] = pDebugRenderOverride;
00802 }

00829 UINT32 SexScreenInit(void)
00830 {
00831       return( TRUE );
00832 } 
00833 
00834 #define SMILY_DELAY                                   100
00835 #define SMILY_END_DELAY                   1000
00836 
00837 UINT32 SexScreenHandle(void)
00838 {
00839       static UINT8                              ubCurrentScreen = 0;
00840   VOBJECT_DESC                            VObjectDesc;
00841       static UINT32                             guiSMILY;
00842       static INT8                               bCurFrame = 0;
00843       static UINT32                             uiTimeOfLastUpdate = 0, uiTime;
00844   ETRLEObject                                   *pTrav;
00845       HVOBJECT                                        hVObject;
00846       INT16                                                 sX, sY;
00847 
00848       // OK, Clear screen and show smily face....
00849       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, 640,   480, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
00850       InvalidateScreen( );
00851       // Remove cursor....
00852       SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( VIDEO_NO_CURSOR );
00853 
00854       if ( ubCurrentScreen == 0 )
00855       {
00856             // Load face....
00857             VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00858             FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\luckysmile.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00859             if( !AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiSMILY ) )
00860                   AssertMsg(0, "Missing INTERFACE\\luckysmile.sti" );
00861 
00862             // Init screen
00863             bCurFrame = 0;
00864 
00865             ubCurrentScreen = 1;
00866 
00867             uiTimeOfLastUpdate = GetJA2Clock( );
00868 
00869             return( SEX_SCREEN );
00870 
00871       }
00872 
00873       // Update frame
00874       uiTime = GetJA2Clock( );
00875 
00876       // if we are animation smile...
00877       if ( ubCurrentScreen == 1 )
00878       {
00879             PlayJA2StreamingSampleFromFile( "Sounds\\Sex.wav", RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN, NULL );
00880             if ( ( uiTime - uiTimeOfLastUpdate ) > SMILY_DELAY )
00881             {
00882                   uiTimeOfLastUpdate = uiTime;
00883 
00884                   bCurFrame++;
00885 
00886                   if ( bCurFrame == 32 )
00887                   {
00888                         // Start end delay
00889                         ubCurrentScreen = 2;
00890                   }
00891             }
00892       }
00893 
00894       if ( ubCurrentScreen == 2 )
00895       {
00896             if ( ( uiTime - uiTimeOfLastUpdate ) > SMILY_END_DELAY )
00897             {
00898                   uiTimeOfLastUpdate = uiTime;
00899 
00900                   ubCurrentScreen = 0;
00901 
00902                   // Remove video object...
00903                   DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSMILY );
00904 
00905                   FadeInGameScreen( );
00906 
00907                   // Advance time...
00908                   // Chris.... do this based on stats?
00909                   WarpGameTime( ( ( 5 + Random( 20 ) ) * NUM_SEC_IN_MIN ), WARPTIME_NO_PROCESSING_OF_EVENTS );
00910 
00911                   return( GAME_SCREEN );
00912             }
00913       }
00914 
00915       // Calculate smily face positions...
00916       GetVideoObject( &hVObject, guiSMILY );
00917       pTrav = &(hVObject->pETRLEObject[ 0 ] );
00918 
00919       sX = (INT16)(( 640 - pTrav->usWidth ) / 2);
00920       sY = (INT16)(( 480 - pTrav->usHeight ) / 2);
00921 
00922       if( bCurFrame < 24 )
00923       {
00924             BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, guiSMILY, 0, sX, sY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
00925       }
00926       else
00927       {
00928             BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, guiSMILY, (INT8)(bCurFrame%8 ), sX, sY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
00929       }
00930 
00931       InvalidateRegion( sX, sY, (INT16)( sX + pTrav->usWidth ), (INT16)( sY + pTrav->usHeight ) );
00932 
00933       return( SEX_SCREEN );
00934 }
00935

00937 {
00938       return( TRUE );
00939 }

00954 extern INT8 gbFadeSpeed;
00955 
00956 #ifdef GERMAN
00957 void DisplayTopwareGermanyAddress()
00958 {
00959       VOBJECT_DESC            vo_desc;
00960       UINT32                              uiTempID;
00961       UINT8 *pDestBuf;
00962       UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
00963       SGPRect ClipRect;
00964   
00965       //bring up the Topware address screen
00966       vo_desc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00967       sprintf( vo_desc.ImageFile, "German\\topware_germany.sti" );
00968       if( !AddVideoObject( &vo_desc, &uiTempID ) )
00969       {     
00970             AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to load German\\topware_germany.sti" );
00971             return;
00972       }
00973 
00974       //Shade out a background piece to emphasize the German address.
00975       ClipRect.iLeft = iScreenWidthOffset + 208;
00976       ClipRect.iRight = iScreenWidthOffset + 431;
00977       ClipRect.iTop = iScreenHeightOffset + 390;
00978       ClipRect.iBottom = iScreenHeightOffset + 475;
00979       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
00980       Blt16BPPBufferShadowRect( (UINT16*)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, &ClipRect );
00981       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
00982 
00983       //Draw the anti-aliased address now.
00984       BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, uiTempID, 0, iScreenWidthOffset + 218, iScreenHeightOffset + 400, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
00985       BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, uiTempID, 0, iScreenWidthOffset + 218, iScreenHeightOffset + 400, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
00986       InvalidateRegion( iScreenWidthOffset + 208, iScreenHeightOffset + 390, iScreenWidthOffset + 431, iScreenHeightOffset + 475 );
00987       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( uiTempID );
00988       ExecuteBaseDirtyRectQueue();
00989       EndFrameBufferRender();
00990 }
00991 #endif
